ygData.subject: "Useless" songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought I d look through the list and see which songs I don t use.  At level 57, these are the ones I haven t used at all in the last 2 months.  Maybe
ygData.messageBody:
I thought I'd look through the list and see which songs I don't use. At
level 57, these are the ones I haven't used at all in the last 2
months. Maybe somebody has some bright ideas on some of them!

3 - Jaxan's Jig o'Vigor: Cantana does enough.
6 - Hymn of Restoration: I can't figure out what it stacks with.
7 - Jonthan's Whistling Warsong: Later versions are better?
10 - Anthem de Arms: VoV better?
12 - Brusco's Boastful Bellow: Heh
15 - Kelin's Lucid Lullaby: Well, I did mem it to check it out. Heh
again.
20 - Cassindra's Chant of Clarity: I've got better.
24 - Lyssa's Veracious Concord: We've had this discussion :)
28 - Crission's Pixie Strike: 53 is plenty good enough
34 - Cantana of Soothing: I've got better.
35 - Denon's Dissension: Now, really, isn't THIS worthless?
36 - Vilia's Verses of Celerity: I've got better.
42 - McVaxius' Berserker Crescendo: Someone find a stackable use for
this?
50 - Melody of Ervaj: I've never been in a party where this would be
useful.
53 - Song of Dawn: Reducing aggro on secondary MOBs doesn't help when
you're the only one on the list. Primary MOBs are easy to ditch. Plus,
I can just wait for the Cleric to heal me, now.
56 - Song of Highsun: Well, I've memmed it, but it's always nighttime.
56 - Song of Midnight: Well, I've memmed it, but it's always daytime.

Really, a pretty short list, if you think about it.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk
